# TVI Teknoloji

> AI-Powered B2B SaaS Solutions for Turkish SMEs

## About
TVI Teknoloji is a Turkish technology company founded in 2010, building AI-powered B2B SaaS solutions for small and medium enterprises. The company focuses on digital transformation and AI adoption for Turkish businesses.

## Products

### Vizitmor
Healthcare practice management system for clinics and medical professionals.
- URL: https://vizitmor.com

### BulunAI
AI-powered SEO analysis platform for website optimization and search visibility.
- URL: https://bulunai.com

### MüşterimAI
B2B sales intelligence platform for customer discovery and sales optimization.
- URL: https://musterimai.com

### KolayPost
Content automation platform for professionals and consultants.
- URL: https://kolaypost.com

### NiyetAI
Conversion optimization tool using AI for intent analysis.
- URL: https://niyetai.com

## Leadership
- Founder & CEO: Teoman Metehan (https://teomanmetehan.com)

## Contact
- Website: https://tvi.com.tr
- Email: info@tvi.com.tr
- Location: Istanbul, Turkey
